column4: why can't I find the console from applications menu, like while testing with a CD?

yeah as you are running sudo
type your login password
why are you doing it that way, firefox is in the repos
the password entry is hidden
sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get -y install firefox-3.0
yep, its telling you how to fix it
add sudo to the start of the command
ANYTHING you do with packages needs sudo

VirtualBox isn't showing at Add & Remove files -menu, can I delete it manually somehow?
dpkg -l | grep -i virtual
remove any packages from there you deem suitable
